title: Text of a Message to the Congress on Emergency Funding Designations – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Economy & Jobs	

Issued on:
January 29, 2020
In accordance with section 904 of title IX of the United States-Mexico-Canada Agreement Implementation Act (H.R. 5430; the “Act”), I hereby designate as emergency requirements all funding so designated by the Congress in the Act pursuant to section 251(b)(2)(A) of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985, as outlined in the enclosed list of accounts.The details of this action are set forth in the enclosed memorandum from the Acting Director of the Office of Management and Budget.THE WHITE HOUSE,
January 29, 2020.
